title: Never a Tender Moment 1979 - Marilyn Chambers - Rare Classic XXX
description:
TITLE: Never a Tender Moment
YEAR: 1979
Cast: Marilyn Chambers, Erica Boyer, Tana Robinson 

The history of Never a Tender Moment is as grainy and faded as the few existing copies of this S&M-themed short.
This short was produced in 1979 at the O'Farrell Theater in San Francisco by Cinema 7, the Mitchell Brothers' film company.
Never a Tender Moment was shot in the theater's "Ultra Room" and featured Marilyn discussing various bondage delights followed by scenes of intense kink, including a notable upside down dildo scene.
This short was only available through direct mail order from the Mitchell Brothers.
It was likely available on 8MM and/or 16MM film first before being converted to VHS.

The quality of this video isn't very high, but it's currently the best you can find.
